description: The Canada School of Public Service is looking for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture. The solicitation is open to suppliers who are Crown corporations, enterprises, or provincial organizations that meet the set-aside requirements. Please note that the bid submission deadline has expired. It has also been noted that the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) does not apply to this procurement and article 800 of CFTA includes a waiver for this particular procurement.
full_summary:
### Furniture for Work Spaces (Canada School of Public Service)
#### Document Reference

* Solicitation number: CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295
* Reference number: PW-23-01027290
* Amendment number: 2
* Publication date: 2023-02-23
* Tender closure date: 2023-03-06T14:00:00

#### Commodity Description
Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) requires the delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario, Canada by March 31, 2023. The requirement includes:

* Metal filing and storage cabinets (Product Category 3)
* Ancillary and lighting products (Product Category 5)

#### Procurement Details
This solicitation is issued under the provisions of:
* Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-140003/C, which covers specific product categories
* Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)
* Set-aside from the international trade agreements

#### Selection Criteria
Evaluation will be based on other evaluation factors (OEF) [insert link to OEF]

#### Security Requirements
A security requirement is associated with this procurement. For more information, refer to the bid solicitation document.

#### Solicitation Document
The solicitation document and attachments can be accessed via the [insert link]. Key documents attached:
* CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295-en.pdf
* CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295-fr.pdf
* Amendment 1 (CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295-m1.pdf)
* Amendment 2 (CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295-m2.pdf)
* Questions and Answers (CSPS-RFB-22CP-2295-QNA.pdf)

#### Contact Information
For procurement information, contact:
* Cynthia Prudhomme
* Email: <cynthia.prudhomme@csps-efpc.gc.ca>
* Telephone: [insert contact number]

#### Quote Submission
Please ensure that all questions are addressed in the solicitation document before submitting your quote. Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) reserves the right to terminate the Request for Proposal (RFP) or make no award. The effective date for the contract start and end dates will be determined at a later time. 

#### Competition
Canada is looking for suppliers that can deliver the required products by the contract date of March 31, 2023. Suppliers may indicate a different delivery date in their
